Please see extensive discussion on talk page.9514271192020041703102020-04-1703:10FriendlyRiverOtter0→‎Transmission: it’s better to go approximate with 10 feet, rather than the over-precise 9 ft. 10 in, esp. since we’re talking about a range anyway.
